query: SELECT 'contacts' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM contacts WHERE name LIKE '%Test%' OR name LIKE '%Vitest%' UNION ALL SELECT 'tasks', COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE title LIKE '%Vitest%' OR title LIKE '%Bulk Delete%' UNION ALL SELECT 'payroll', COUNT(*) FROM payroll_records UNION ALL SELECT 'employees', COUNT(*) FROM employees;
